pkgmetadata.longdescription: FCROS to search for differentially expressed genes and to detect recurrent chromosomal copy number aberrations. // A fold change rank ordering statistics method is presented to search for differentially expressed genes and to detect recurrent chromosomal copy number aberrations. This method may be useful for high-throughput biological data (microarray, sequencing, ...). Probabilities are associated with genes in the dataset and there is no problem of multiple tests when using this method.
